nodes.title: SWE Portfolio Landing Page
nodes.what: A single-page portfolio showcasing a software engineer’s skills, projects, and contact information.
nodes.how: Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Uses a responsive flex/grid layout and dark-mode support via the existing use-theme hook.

nodes.title: Header Section
nodes.what: Sticky top bar displaying the engineer’s name/logo and site navigation.
nodes.how: Flex container with a left-aligned logo text and right-aligned scroll-link buttons (About, Projects, Contact). Collapses into a hamburger Sheet component on small screens.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.what: Above-the-fold introduction with headline, short bio, and call-to-action button.
nodes.how: Two-column grid: text stack on the left and an SVG/3D illustration on the right. Uses Button component for the CTA linking to the Projects section.

nodes.title: Projects Section
nodes.what: Gallery of highlighted projects with images, descriptions, and links to GitHub/live demos.
nodes.how: Responsive CSS grid of Card components; each card contains project screenshot, tech badge stack, description, and action buttons.

nodes.title: Contact & Footer Section
nodes.what: Contact form and social links followed by footer credits.
nodes.how: Two rows: 1) Form component using Input, Textarea, and Button primitives that POSTs to /api/contact; 2) centered social icon buttons and copyright text.
